about_the_game:
Port Valley is a (not so) classic Point & Click adventure game where perspective changes everything! Witness Port Valley's Election Day from three different points of view: An extremely lazy Asian food delivery guy, a mysterious female plumber… and someone else.

One by one, these unusual "heroes" will be forced to interrupt their boring everyday lives and get ready for action before it's just too late. Work, revenge, political conspiracies, a banana balloon… it seems everything was meant to clash on this specific day.

It's finally time to overcome the crossed paths of Port Valley’s singular citizens and unfold the obscure plot that is tying together these apparently unrelated stories.

Some Key Features


  • 3 plots, 3 main characters, 3 mayoral candidates… 3 chances to unfold a bigger and complex story.
  • A renewed (yet classic!) Point & Click interface.
  • A light-hearted, comical tone with annoying self-aware humor. (Which doesn't necessarily mean this is just a comedy *wink* *wink*.)
  • Even more annoying puzzles with different ways to solve them. For real.
  • Active NPCs. They also have objectives, they're not 'just there' to give you stuff.
  • It's surprisingly not about detectives. (I swear it's legal in this genre.)
  • There's a dog...?

The 2022 DEMO

  • It's an hour-long experience with all-new content focused on gameplay, animations and the new UI.
  • The puzzles and the plot have been simplified so it can be played as an independent thing. Please, don't judge the game's difficulty just yet!
